title: The Professor and the Nanny
description: Nelly is a recent college graduate who is working for her former professor Bradley Benford as a nanny. The sparks fly as they grow closer together and Nelly begins to hope that she will get to know Bradley as more than a professor or a boss.This is a sexy short story that many find erotic and sweet. A great quick read for those who like their romance with a little spice. This is an erotic romance.
author: Helen    Cooper
